value.title: AI + IoT = 1000X More Dense Networking Environments: How Intel, NSF Are Planning For Tomorrow
value.excerpt: How will we connect everything at such scale? Intel and the National Science Foundation say we’ll need help from artificial intelligence. And mesh networks. Including, potentially, even SpaceX Starlink satellites in low earth orbit.
